nodes.text: Charm's Way was a large Naboo freighter captained by Reeve Dallows prior to his disappearance.
Charm's Way and its convoy once came under attack from a number of mercenaries, flying Dianoga, Dagger and MorningStar starfighters. The attack was repelled by Bravo Flight pilot Essara Till.
Charm's Way appears in a bonus mission in the 2001 video game, Star Wars: Starfighter.
